NAME: EBGB Stage
EBGB Dance Floor
DESC:
Ted walks out onto the dance floor. There are two drunk hippies making out
furiously. Ted tries to ignore them.

The bartender can be seen wiping down the bar; last call hasn't been announced.

NAME: EBGB Backstage
DESC:
Ted finds himself trudging through a sea of beer cans, roaches, and used
condoms. Lying on top of a case is a grungy white guitar that was used
by the cover band.

{FCYAN}TED: {BRIGHT}"Dumbass left his guitar."{NORMAL}{FWHITE}

NAME: EBGB Bathrooms
EBGB Bar
EBGB Jukebox
EBGB Parking Lot
DESC:
Ted leaves EBGBs to find his sweet looking Winnibego in the parking lot.

To the east is a swirling black wormhole. It's sucking in small bits of debris
from the ground around it.

NAME: Black Wormhole
DESC:
Ted steps into the black wormhole. As he reaches the event
horizon he feels his body begin to warp and dissipate.

{FCYAN}TED: {BRIGHT}"FUU-"{NORMAL}{FWHITE}

After what seems like eons, Ted's body begins to materialize again.

{FCYAN}TED: {BRIGHT}"-UUCK."{NORMAL}{FWHITE}

Ted finds himself in a dark alley that looks like it might be on the planet
Mactel 6. Lounging before him in a mound of used condoms and empty Dark Matter
Ale bottles there's a rough looking buzzoid hobo smoking what looks to be a
joint made of trash.

{FGREEN}HOBO: {BRIGHT}"What'll ya be havin', stranger?"{NORMAL}{FWHITE}

The hobo smirks maniacally and opens his shitty excuse for wings to reveal a
smorgasbord of psychedelic drugs.

NAME: Winnibego
DESC:
Ted's trusty steed, the ol' Winnie. It smells of dude and weed in here.

Ted sees a flashing light on the console that reads: {FGREEN}IGNITION{NORMAL}{FWHITE}
